page.title: 03W.Southampton, Hospital 1.
page.content:
{The Princess Anne Maternity Hospital.
The hospital was opened on the 28th of March 1981.They employ{250 nurses}plus porters,doctors,domestic staff and catering staff.About{5000 babies}are born each year.{528 of those are {premature.}The smallest baby ever born in the hospital weighed{900gms.}They have Delivery wards,Intensive care wards and 3 gynaecology wards ,an out_ patients ward and Victoria ward in which mothers and babies are kept together.They have 138 beds and nurses work 37.5 hours in a week with 2 meal breaks. Nightshift is from 7.30pm_4.00 with two meal breaks.In September 1983 men were allowed to train as midwives. 300 babies are born in hospital and 30 in the home so you can see numbers are very small in comparison.There are no men patients except male babies!
